title: ITEE 2013
description:
6th International Conference on Information Technologies in Environmental Engineering

Information Technologies in Environmental Engineering (ITEE) are the topic of a conference-row, taking place every two years since 2003. Past venues have been Greece (Thessaloniki, 2009), Poland (Poznan, 2011 and Gdansk, 2003) and Germany (Oldenburg, 2007 and Magdeburg, 2005).

The 6th ITEE-Conference will be held at Leuphana University Lüneburg in the northern part of Germany from 10-12 July 2013.

Recent success stories and new ideas in ecoinformatics, sustainable development, interdisciplinary approaches, where computer science offers the infrastructure for environmental data collection and management, scientific simulations, decision support and reporting will be discussed among computer scientists, environmental engineers, economists and social scientists, demonstrating new paradigms for problem solving and decision making.

The conference proceedings will be published in the Environmental Science and Engineering-Series by Springer.

– Paper submission:  February 03, 2013  – extended February 10, 2013
– Author notification:  February 24, 2013
– Revised papers:      March 10, 2013
– Conference:            July 10-12, 2013
